anyways i have to get ready for school shortly and i havent gone to bed. god ya gotta love all nighters. i have to fix my sleeping patterns. i am feeling lonelier the more time passes and i dont want to be lonely. i know there has to be someone out there for me. i have some crushes but they dont matter because i dont matter much to people enough to like. i wish i could just read girls minds and find out if im on there minds other than ewww that kid is a creepy fuckin fuck. i swear he says one more thing about dead bodies then im going to call the fuckin fuzz. well sorry about that. ive been angry lately. i need a backpack for school. anyone want to donate one to me? well let me know. comment on this. Yea whats the deal yo. its 511 and its sunday/saturday night and im doing homework. boy i suck. i went to the penny arcade to day and i got picked up by michelle & leanne. Michelle paid for me and wanted me to go there so i obliged its better than sitting around by myself on saturday.i saw eddie there and stuff. i lost michelle she vanished w/o a trace. i wish i got a chance to thank her. but anyways ricky was there too with eddie so i chilled w/ them the whole night. we went to johns again and had the another galeotti session. yesterday we went to joshes b-day party and got really shitty. then went to johns and had a galeotti surprise. then went to dennys and talked with drunk meican club goers and watched a fat bitch fell and knock shit over. then the whole damn resteraunt sang happy birthday. then went home it was mad fun. dude fucking look @ this i knew i suck and ill die lonley. look @ this shit.

I recentally saw slayer and slipnknot and hatebreed. I must say Seeing Slayer has changed my life forever. I can now kill myself and die with a little happiness because seeing slayer was the best thing going for me. lately ive been really depressed and i feel confused 24/7. ive been havng these weird reoccuring dreams where im choking myself with a wire hanger until my throat is fully cut and i cant breathe. then i wake up and its hard to breathe almost and ill down a full cup of kool aid or soda or whatever is right near my bed. ive been making beats alot more here and there nowawdays. ive been writing alot of verses lately. you know how the writers true side shows through in his work. Well if thats the case then i must be really angry, hurt, resentful, and depressed. I tend to not write about love or sex or anything else.Havent wrote a rap about weed drinking. eh i think theres something deep down inside and it feels like theres no one to talk to. i have close friends but there not there for deep personal talks. i kinda just wish there was someone to talk to sometime. but there really isnt. well im going to go masterbate and eat ice cream. just kidding. ill prolly just masterbate.











haha no but really i have no mood for it so ill probably smoke a ciggerette and eat a sandwhich and watch chappelles newest stand up special then listen to Hells Pit and lie in bed. pz yall

man lately ive been feeling fucked up in the head. ive been so depressed lately. its the end of summer and everything i set to accomplish didnt go as planned. i wanted to have fun and party, did it happen no not really. i wanted to get a job, im still a bum. i wanted to be driving, im still walking. i wanted to get a girl friend or fall in love or @ least start talking to someone, im still jerking off. i guess ive been full of lots of anger, depression, and confusion. i havent updated this live journal thing for awhile but its because of this damned myspace.com ive been obbsessed with cause of amanda mack this and writing. ive been writing alot lately.
i wrote this one the other day it really scared me because i wanted to just drop all of my feelings into the verse and i read it and was scared i could think this way. 

im the living dead,
and the dying living
everyday im sinnin,
fuck it help me out,
of this shithole
i see footprints,
in the sand,
but i dont know,
if i should follow,
im pondering thoughts,
of death and dying,
im not here for a purpose,
i reach into my exsistance,
ive thrown away all hopes,
and dreams and emotions,
theres no faith in my life,
in my heart tearin me apart,
the voices telling me to use drugs,
poisen my body so i wont,
feel the pain inside,
ive fuckin lost my mind,
puffin l's with my inner demons,
ghosts and skeletons in the closet,
im about to have my last,
outer body expierence,
so i can join my dads spirits,
im ending this sunrise early,
paint the canvas of pain with my blood,
theres no signs of god here,
so to hell i come let me in,
one slash starts it another,
finishes it as i run the bathwater,
let my blood run down the drain,
its to late for any therapists,
ive left this earthly wasteland early,
its my life i play god and cease life,
so im dead know its to late to care,
about whose caring about,
my blood stained knife

so 2day i missed my summer school bus so i got a ride w/ amanda oh yea my good old buddy amanda probably the only girl i would want to have sex w/ but would feel guilty about it cuz shes so damned cool. i seriously love her shes the coolest person shes the reason i passed 1/2 of horticulture this year. i got there all high i smoked a bowl of white widow b4 i left for school and on the way there.i just fell asleep. then the teacher was asking me questions in my sleep and i rambled on about pancakes and hippos and just a 5 minute random word speach on why the world is worried about global warming. lol. then my phone rang in the middle of class i woke up to answer it and talk shit into my cell phone for a good 5 minutes to some1 i dont kno who but it was sum 1 i just picked up the phone said im in class trying to fuckin sleep and your a goddamned asshole for ruinin that shit for me. lol. i was out cold. so as im leavin summer school i see my good old wegmans/arcadia buddy Melissa. So i talked 2 hurr and asked her 4 a ride to josh dayton (yup like the rims). so i got there and me and him got high smoked some cool bongs. (Big O, the eyeball, and the lazy one manned hookah) it was fun we were all high and we played Mario Golf i lost badly i golfed a +18 Josh broke even. then we got hungry and josh walked downstairs w/ a big tin full of sugar cookies and Jiffy PB. We made our own ghetto pb sugar cookies. it was awesome. then we watcheed i love the 90's and fell asleep and had a very long 4 1/2 hour nap i woke up around 830 n had tha ma dukes come and scoop me up. then i got home ate some chicken and potatos then went to the kwikfill like usual to chill w/ Kenny Ken and watched him skateboard.It was sweet because he fell really hard and it looked painful i sat there and said thank god imma fat kid and i dont skate that looks like it hurts kinda badly. geez this song feels how i feel right now [D-Loc] Same o' ex and punk rock veins (fuck off) Same bounced checks signed different names Same o' sheets got the crusty cum stains (eww) Same dirty thoughts I got a dick for brains (daddy) Same o' story same o' routine Same ear fuck same o' bafiend Same o' player same o' ass ways Same o' number back from my club days Same o' same o' we got some new shit I just bought a truck and I got a new crib While you got a new crib, I just purchased a pound About to chop it all up and about to swing it around my town ~ Kottonmouth Kings - "Paid Vacation" i kinda feel like my life is the same all day and it needs a change. it really does need a change like i need a job and a car. Gangstas don't die, they get chubby, and move to Miami yea recognize that shit all i need 2 do is move 2 miami now. i feel really lonely lately i just want to come across some money and shit im tired of being broke and shit. it sucks balls dude. im 18 no job no car no girls no weed no nothin. it sucks balls big time mayn.but anyways if u want 2 get 2 kno the mikey g and u r single let a ninja kno for real. well yea so that essay i only got a fuckin 50% on it cuz i didnt use enough details. fuck that shit i used the only details i saw and it was that negro buying rocks. @ least he fealt it was entertaining oh well. well im off to eat some beef jerky and shit. so ill peep ya anusholes later. what u kno about a killa with no respect, ill slice out your neck ~ Q Strange oh yea heres a verse i wrote 2day: "Gittin Gangstahhh" in the darkside like darth vadar, vadar bomb ya ass to death, my crews slippery greasy, just like a bad jheri curl, i live by tha code g's up hoes down, stayin a muthafuckin g to tha core, ima stone cold triple g o-g, strapped wit a jimmy hat an a 9, you can call me tha Next, cuz if they was good b4 im the next, twistin ya crews fuckin necks, all by my dolo to make dough, keepin it all an grippin my auotmatic, poppin off my toasters, now there callin u pop tart, and forever u eternally rest sweetheart... yea i was a little angry so i had 2 kill someone again in a song pz outty
